title: Older Person Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents an elderly individual with a dark skin tone. It can be used to refer to grandparents, elders, or wise figures.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the older person emoji with dark skin is rendered with gentle wisdom and a warm, approachable demeanor. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft lighting highlight the subtle lines of experience and a kindly expression, conveying maturity and respect. This emoji is often used to represent elders, grandparents, or to express a sense of nostalgia and fond memories.
